channel.title: Ducktales Ii on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Ducktales Ii on My New Hugo Site

item.title: It’s A Duck Blur
item.description: [big]In the past couple of weeks, a bit of DuckTales-mania has hit the internet in a way that could best be described as giddy-ing. It’s understandable. It’s not every day Disney gives the fans what they want—and it ’s not every day that the results of that are pretty amazing.[/big] https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EURi91Eb6I8 And it’s worth that level of nostalgia, because it’s reviving what perhaps was the most important cartoon of the ‘80s—both culturally and from an economic standpoint.
